metadata.title: CVE-2019-0193 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In Apache Solr, the DataImportHandler, an optional but popular module topull in data from databases and other sources, has a feature in which thewhole DIH configuration can come from a request's "dataConfig" parameter.The debug mode of the DIH admin screen uses this to allow convenientdebugging / development of a DIH config. Since a DIH config can containscripts, this parameter is a security risk. Starting with version 8.2.0 ofSolr, use of this parameter requires setting the Java System property"enable.dih.dataConfigParam" to true.

criterions.comment: lucene-solr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
